def_en: A lather is a white mass of bubbles which is produced by mixing a substance such as soap or washing powder with water.
When a substance such as soap or washing powder lathers, it produces a white mass of bubbles because it has been mixed with water.

def_cn: 在…上涂以肥皂（或洗衣粉等）（以产生泡沫并清洗）
def_en: If you lather something, you rub a substance such as soap or washing powder on it until a lather is produced, in order to clean it.

def_cn: （无必要地）焦躁不安，发火
def_en: If you say that someone works themselves up into a lather or gets in a lather about something, you think that they are getting upset, angry, or worried about it when there is no need to do so.
